summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, where Staley expresses his appreciation for Epstein, referring to him as a great friend. The email also contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and intended only for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, communicating with Jes Staley and discussing their friendship.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, who expresses his friendship towards Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley have a friendly relationship, as indicated by Staley's message calling Epstein a great friend.

keyFacts: The email was sent on February 21, 2010.
Jes Staley refers to Jeffrey Epstein as a great friend.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
